title: RHOC - A Boat Fashion Show/Gina's Hair Origin Recap + RHOD Girl's Night Recap

description:
Danny recap's this week's Real Housewives of Orange County episode, which featured a boat fashion show, the origin story of Gina's confessional hair, Kathy's star-making turn, and more! On Real Housewives of Dallas, we get a SAVAGE Mama Dee, another wedding-related event, and Brandi answers texts about beef from a stranger.


#RHOD: 40:27ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
